H0.text: Which much-loved actor won the Best Actor Oscar for The Philadelphia Story. Cary Grant

H1.text: Which much-loved actor won the Best Actor Oscar for The Philadelphia Story. Clark Gable

H2.text: Which much-loved actor won the Best Actor Oscar for The Philadelphia Story. Spencer Tracy

H3.text: Which much-loved actor won the Best Actor Oscar for The Philadelphia Story. Jimmy Stuart

A4.text: both his lead co-stars, Hepburn and James Stewart, received them, with Stewart winning for Best Actor.

A5.text: Grant felt his performance was so strong that he was bitterly disappointed not to have received an Oscar nomination.
